Tim Robbins Compares ICE to Nazi SS: ‘Function Is to Deport People of Color’ and ‘Ethnic Cleansing’ Actor-director Tim Robbins has compared U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) to the Nazi SS, claiming that ICE's mission is to "deport people of color" and carry out "ethnic cleansing in America."
Study: 2006 Border Wall Shrank Migration by One-Third The ramshackle 2006 border wall reduced northward migration by roughly one third, according to a detailed study by a peer-reviewed journal.
